existing_features.title: Increase the font size and overall dimensions of the Gmail contact card (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[9]/div[1]/div[2]/a[4]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]) in the ContactSection component while ensuring the email address fits on one line without wrapping or overflow

new_feature_requests.summary: Increase Gmail size while keeping it on one line

projectName: Increase Gmail contact card size while maintaining single-line layout
